languages.text:
The psyber-raven gains +30 Willpower.
At the start of combat, veil degradation is increased by +5.
While veil degradation is 10 or more, the psyber-raven suffers no damage and any {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} psychic powers deal an additional {uip|Damage|cedb3ce1e67344f9bfe120ed3b81aae3} warp damage to enemies affected.

traits.locale_text:
The psyber-raven gains +30 Willpower.
At the start of combat, veil degradation is increased by +5.
While veil degradation is 10 or more, the psyber-raven suffers no damage and any {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} psychic powers deal an additional {uip|Damage|cedb3ce1e67344f9bfe120ed3b81aae3} warp damage to enemies affected.

languages.text:
The psyber-raven gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
At the start of combat, {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is increased by +5.
While veil degradation is 10 or more, the psyber-raven suffers no {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and any {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} deal an additional {uip|Damage|cedb3ce1e67344f9bfe120ed3b81aae3} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} to enemies affected.
languages.original_text:
Псайберворон получает +30 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g}.
В начале боя {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}истончение завесы{/g} увеличивается на 5.
Пока истончение завесы равно 10 или больше, псайберворон не получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, а любая {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}ретранслированная{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосила{/g} наносит затронутым врагам {uip|Damage|cedb3ce1e67344f9bfe120ed3b81aae3} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урона{/g} дополнительно.

languages.text:
Ruhsiber kuzgun +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliği kazanır.
Çatışma başladığında {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}örtü bozulması{/g} +5 artar.
Örtü bozulması 10 veya üstündeyse ruhsiber kuzgun hiçbir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} maruz kalmaz ve {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}aktarılan{/g} her türlü {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücü{/g}, etkilenen düşmanlara ilave {uip|Damage|cedb3ce1e67344f9bfe120ed3b81aae3} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}öteboyut hasarı{/g} verir.
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
At the start of combat, {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is increased by +5.
While veil degradation is 10 or more, the psyber-raven suffers no {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and any {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} deal an additional {uip|Damage|cedb3ce1e67344f9bfe120ed3b81aae3} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} to enemies affected.

traits.locale_text:
Ruhsiber kuzgun +30 İrade niteliği kazanır.
Çatışma başladığında örtü bozulması +5 artar.
Örtü bozulması 10 veya üstündeyse ruhsiber kuzgun hiçbir hasara maruz kalmaz ve {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}aktarılan{/g} her türlü ruhsezi gücü, etkilenen düşmanlara ilave {uip|Damage|cedb3ce1e67344f9bfe120ed3b81aae3} öteboyut hasarı verir.

Ruhsiber kuzgun +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliği kazanır.
Çatışma başladığında örtü bozulması +5 artar.
Örtü bozulması 10 veya üstündeyse ruhsiber kuzgun hiçbir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} maruz kalmaz ve {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}aktarılan{/g} her türlü ruhsezi gücü, etkilenen düşmanlara ilave {uip|Damage|cedb3ce1e67344f9bfe120ed3b81aae3} öteboyut hasarı verir.

languages.text:
El psicocuervo recibe +30 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}.
Al comienzo del combate, la degradación del velo aumenta en +5.
Mientras la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degradación del velo{/g} sea de 10 o más, el psicocuervo no sufre ningún {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y todos los {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} que {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmite{/g} infligen {uip|Damage|cedb3ce1e67344f9bfe120ed3b81aae3} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g} adicional a los enemigos afectados.
languages.original_text:

While veil degradation is 10 or more, the psyber-raven suffers no {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and any {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} deal an additional {uip|Damage|cedb3ce1e67344f9bfe120ed3b81aae3} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} to enemies affected.

traits.locale_text:
El psicocuervo recibe +30 de Voluntad.
Al comienzo del combate, la degradación del velo aumenta en +5.
Mientras la degradación del velo sea de 10 o más, el psicocuervo no sufre ningún daño y todos los poderes psíquicos que {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmite{/g} infligen {uip|Damage|cedb3ce1e67344f9bfe120ed3b81aae3} de daño de disformidad adicional a los enemigos afectados.

El psicocuervo recibe +30 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}.
Al comienzo del combate, la degradación del velo aumenta en +5.
Mientras la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degradación del velo{/g} sea de 10 o más, el psicocuervo no sufre ningún {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y todos los {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} que {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmite{/g} infligen {uip|Damage|cedb3ce1e67344f9bfe120ed3b81aae3} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g} adicional a los enemigos afectados.

languages.text:
生化渡鸦的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}提高30点。
战斗开始时，障壁恶化程度提高5点。
当{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁{/g}恶化程度至少为10点时，生化渡鸦不会受到任何{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，且所有{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}都会对受影响的敌人额外造成{uip|Damage|cedb3ce1e67344f9bfe120ed3b81aae3}点{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
At the start of combat, {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is increased by +5.
While veil degradation is 10 or more, the psyber-raven suffers no {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and any {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} deal an additional {uip|Damage|cedb3ce1e67344f9bfe120ed3b81aae3} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} to enemies affected.

traits.locale_text:
生化渡鸦的意志提高30点。
战斗开始时，障壁恶化程度提高5点。
当障壁恶化程度至少为10点时，生化渡鸦不会受到任何伤害，且所有{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}的灵能能力都会对受影响的敌人额外造成{uip|Damage|cedb3ce1e67344f9bfe120ed3b81aae3}点亚空间伤害。

languages.text:
Der Psitech-Rabe erhält +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}.
Zu Beginn des Kampfes wird der {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Zerfall des Schleiers{/g} um +5 erhöht.
Bei "Zerfall des Schleiers" von 10 oder mehr erleidet der Psitech-Rabe keinen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, und alle {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}übertragenen{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kräfte{/g} verursachen zusätzlich {uip|Damage|cedb3ce1e67344f9bfe120ed3b81aae3} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g} bei betroffenen Gegnern.
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
At the start of combat, {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is increased by +5.
While veil degradation is 10 or more, the psyber-raven suffers no {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and any {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} deal an additional {uip|Damage|cedb3ce1e67344f9bfe120ed3b81aae3} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} to enemies affected.

traits.locale_text:
Der Psitech-Rabe erhält +30 Willenskraft.
Zu Beginn des Kampfes wird der Zerfall des Schleiers um +5 erhöht.
Bei "Zerfall des Schleiers" von 10 oder mehr erleidet der Psitech-Rabe keinen Schaden, und alle {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}übertragenen{/g} psionischen Kräfte verursachen zusätzlich {uip|Damage|cedb3ce1e67344f9bfe120ed3b81aae3} Warp-Schaden bei betroffenen Gegnern.

Der Psitech-Rabe erhält +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}.
Zu Beginn des Kampfes wird der {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Zerfall des Schleiers{/g} um +5 erhöht.
Bei "Zerfall des Schleiers" von 10 oder mehr erleidet der Psitech-Rabe keinen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, und alle {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}übertragenen{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kräfte{/g} verursachen zusätzlich {uip|Damage|cedb3ce1e67344f9bfe120ed3b81aae3} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g} bei betroffenen Gegnern.

languages.text:
La psyber-corneille reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} de +30.
Au début du combat, {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Dégradation du voile{/g} est augmentée de +5.
Tant que Dégradation du Voile est d'au moins 10, la psyber-corneille ne subit aucun {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégât{/g}, et les {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} qu'elle {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relaie{/g} inflige {uip|Damage|cedb3ce1e67344f9bfe120ed3b81aae3} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts du Warp{/g} supplémentaires aux ennemis affectés.
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
At the start of combat, {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is increased by +5.
While veil degradation is 10 or more, the psyber-raven suffers no {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and any {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} deal an additional {uip|Damage|cedb3ce1e67344f9bfe120ed3b81aae3} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} to enemies affected.

traits.locale_text:
La psyber-corneille reçoit un bonus de Force mentale de +30.
Au début du combat, Dégradation du Voile est augmentée de +5.
Tant que Dégradation du Voile est d'au moins 10, la psyber-corneille ne subit aucun dégât, et les pouvoirs psychiques qu'elle {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relaie{/g} inflige {uip|Damage|cedb3ce1e67344f9bfe120ed3b81aae3} dégâts du Warp supplémentaires aux ennemis affectés.

languages.text:
サイバーレイヴンの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}は+30される。
戦闘開始時、{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}が+5増加する。
ヴェールの劣化が10以上の場合、サイバーレイヴンは{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けることはなく、{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}引き継がれた{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}の影響を受けた敵に追加の{uip|Damage|cedb3ce1e67344f9bfe120ed3b81aae3}{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}ワープダメージ{/g}を与える。

At the start of combat, {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is increased by +5.
While veil degradation is 10 or more, the psyber-raven suffers no {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and any {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} deal an additional {uip|Damage|cedb3ce1e67344f9bfe120ed3b81aae3} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} to enemies affected.

サイバーレイヴンの意志力は+30される。
戦闘開始時、ヴェールの劣化が+5増加する。
ヴェールの劣化が10以上の場合、サイバーレイヴンはダメージを受けることはなく、{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}引き継がれた{/g}超能力の影響を受けた敵に追加の{uip|Damage|cedb3ce1e67344f9bfe120ed3b81aae3}ワープダメージを与える。
